short_description: Fastpath function to generate a new feature by taking a non linear combination of existing features using the parameters from TD_NonLinearCombineFit output.
long_description: Fastpath function to generate a new feature by taking a non linear combination of existing features using the parameters from TD_NonLinearCombineFit output.

input_tables.name: InputTable
input_tables.rDescription: The relation that contains input data.
input_tables.description: The relation that contains input data.

input_tables.name: FitTable
input_tables.rDescription: The relation that contains fit parameters and target columns, generated by TD_NonLinearCombineFit function.
input_tables.description: The relation that contains fit parameters and target columns, generated by TD_NonLinearCombineFit function.

argument_clauses.name: Accumulate
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the input table columns to copy to the output table. By default, the function copies no input table columns to the output table.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the input table columns to copy to the output table. By default, the function copies no input table columns to the output table.
